title: I'd like to buy a nice cabinet photo
author: packs

posts.post_title: I'd like to buy a nice cabinet photo
posts.post_content:
I'm looking for a nice 19th century cabinet photo of a major league player in uniform. I'm definitely interested in N173s, but I'm also looking for studio photos not associated with sets. I'm not interested in minor league players or town team players. I'm also not interested in street clothes photos.

If you have a major league player in uniform cabinet for sale, please do PM me.
